item.title: Bangalore to Kanyakumari Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kanyakumari can be a fascinating journey, as you'll get to experience the diverse landscapes, cultural heritage, and the meeting point of the Arabian Sea, the Indian Ocean, and the Bay of Bengal. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Kanyakumari -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Mad
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
